dict.acceptation: 早晨；上午；黎明；早期，初期；

sent.orig: Good morning, Kitty. Good morning, Ben. Good morning, Eddie. How are you?
sent.trans: 早上好，基蒂。早上好，本。早上好，埃迪。你好吗？

sent.orig: Good morning, boys and girls! Good morning, Miss White.
sent.trans: 早上好，同学们！早上好，怀特老师。

sent.orig: American Morning. The most news in the morning. Period. Weekdays, 6 Eastern.
sent.trans: 美国早晨。早晨最多的新闻。播出时间，周一到周五东部时间6点。

sent.orig: Good morning, Lara. And what a beautiful morning it is.
sent.trans: 早上好，劳拉。多美的早晨。

sent.orig: This morning the director will make an appointment with those to seek the job this morning.
sent.trans: 今天早晨主任要约见那些谋求职位的人。
